title: Houghton Mifflin Harcourt Revolutionizes K-12 Publishing with MarkLogic
abstract: 57 million students in 120 countries depend on Houghton Mifflin Harcourt (HMH) for their educational materials, and HMH relies on MarkLogic to help deliver next generation education products. Built on MarkLogic, HMHâ€™s product customization platform "Custom Solutions" ensures students are learning with specific highly customized content to meet their needs. Paul Despins, senior vice president of publishing services and technology, HMH, will discuss the drastically changing landscape in the education publishing industry and how HMH is responding using MarkLogic. He will also show off HMH products, consider changes in store for tomorrow, and reveal the extraordinary return on investment HMH is getting from MarkLogic.

surveys.comments: Very organized and thorough, inspired lots of questions from audience
